request_data_response_ws.invalidParams: One or more fields are specified incorrectly, or one or more required fields are missing.
request_data_response_ws.lgrNotFound: The ledger specified by the ledger_hash or ledger_index does not exist, or it does exist but the server does not have it.
request_data_response_ws.actNotFound: The Address specified in the account field of the request does not correspond to an account in the ledger.

body.info_value: The price for each asset is calculated using the Decentralized Exchange (DEX) and AMM (Automated Market Maker) on the XRP ledger, and just the Decentralized Exchange on Xahau. It calculates the value of an asset by takiing the last trade price times the amount of tokens you hold.

error.get_ott_data: Failed to fetch your Xaman data
error.subscribe_to_account: Failed to subscribe to the Ledger
error.sign_offer_create: A wild error occured creating an Offer
error.signin: A wild error occured trying to login
error.get_offer_data: A wild error occured trying to get your Offer data
error.get_curated_assets: Currency list is not available from the API
error.react_native_webview: There is an error with the webview
error.trustline_count: This xApp is not optimised for accounts with a lot of Trust Lines. Your account has more Trust Lines than what this xApp has been developed for to work with. This is not a problem for your account. This is not a security risk. We will look to optimise this xApp for more TrustLines in the future.
